text: The chestnut-bellied titi (Plecturocebus caligatus) is a species of titi, a type of New World monkey, endemic to Brazil. It was originally described as Callicebus caligatus in 1842. ==References== chestnut-bellied titi Category:Mammals of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil chestnut-bellied titi
title: Chestnut-bellied titi
